channel.title: [FM] Viva la Revolution - Being Rerolled
channel.description:
# Welcome to Viva la Revolution!
A game mode where four factions fight against each other, though some do have the potential to win with others. While the town is large, the other three factions are only one member each. ## Mechanics • Days last 72 hours, and nights last 24 hours. • Lynch is majority. There is no day one lynch, and day one ends when all players have confirmed. • There are no wills/journals. • Multiple antagonist factions are capable of winning the game, but town can not win alongside them. ## Rolelist **[color=red]One-Shot-Invincible Mafia Vigilante[/color]** **[color=orange]One-Shot-Invincible Arsonist[/color]** **[color=gray]One-Shot-Invincible Anarchist[/color]** **[color=limegreen]Bombproof Bomb Defuser[/color]** **[color=limegreen]Fireproof Firefighter[/color]** **[color=limegreen]Bulletproof Doctor[/color]** **[color=limegreen]Tracker[/color]** **[color=limegreen]Citizen[/color] x6** ## Role Cards > ## [color=red]One-Shot-Invincible Mafia Vigilante[/color] > **One Shot Invincible** - You survive one kill from any source (except a lynch). You will be notified when this occurs. **Shoot** - Each night phase, you can shoot a player, killing them. **([color=red]Bullet-Kill[/color])** *You win if you are amongst the last two living players.* > ## [color=orange]One-Shot-Invincible Arsonist[/color] > **One Shot Invincible** - You survive one kill from any source (except a lynch). You will be notified when this occurs. **Douse** - Each night phase, you can douse a player in gasoline. They are not notified. **Ignite** - Instead of dousing someone, you can instead ignite all doused players, killing them. **([color=orange]Fire-Kill[/color])** *You win if you are amongst the last two living players.* > ## [color=gray]One-Shot-Invincible Anarchist[/color] > **One Shot Invincible** - You survive one kill from any source (except a lynch). You will be notified when this occurs. **Plant Bomb** - Each night phase, you can plant a bomb on a player. They are not notified. They will explode in two nights, killing them. **([color=gray]Bomb-Kill[/color])** *You win if you are amongst the last two living players.* > ## [color=limegreen]Bombproof Bomb Defuser[/color] > **Bombproof** - You are immune to **[color=gray]Bomb-Kills[/color]**. **Defuse** - Each night phase, you can visit a player. That player can not have a bomb planted on them that night, and if they already had a bomb planted on them, it is defused. They are not notified. *You win when all threats to the town have been eliminated and there is at least one town player alive.* > ## [color=limegreen]Fireproof Firefighter[/color] > **Fireproof** - You are immune to **[color=orange]Fire-Kills[/color]**. **Cleanup** - Each night phase, you can visit a player. That player can not be doused in gasoline that night, and if they were already doused, it is removed. They are not notified. *You win when all threats to the town have been eliminated and there is at least one town player alive.* > ## [color=limegreen]Bulletproof Doctor[/color] > **Bulletproof** - You are immune to **[color=red]Bullet-Kills[/color]**. **Heal** - Each night phase, you can heal a player if they are shot. They are not notified. You can not protect against **[color=gray]Bomb-Kills[/color]** or **[color=orange]Fire-Kills[/color]**. *You win when all threats to the town have been eliminated and there is at least one town player alive.* > ## [color=limegreen]Tracker[/color] > **Track** - Each night phase, you can follow a player, tracking who they visit that night, if anybody. *You win when all threats to the town have been eliminated and there is at least one town player alive.* > ## [color=limegreen]Citizen[/color] > Your weapon is your vote. You have no night actions. *You win when all threats to the town have been eliminated and there is at least one town player alive.* ## [color=cyan]:link: Links:[/color] **[Start of Day 1](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-viva-la-revolution-day-two-seeking-replacement-13-13/71253/79?u=ashe)** **[Start of Day 2](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-viva-la-revolution-day-two-seeking-replacement-13-13/71253/287?u=ashe)** ## Player List: 1. **Sarun** 2. **orangeandblack5** 3. **Solic** 4. **Marluxion** 5. **htm** 6. **MaximusPrime** 7. **Margaret** 8. **Firekitten** 9. **Luxy** 10. **Memesky** 11. **Captain** 12. **Frostwolf103** 13. [color=gray]~~PokemonKidRyan~~[/color] **Icibalus** ### Spectators: * Livicus * Twi1light * Boss110 * Blizer ## Graveyard: 0. Ashe - D0 - **[color=yellow]Ascetic Miller[/color]**

item.title: [FM] Viva la Revolution - Being Rerolled
item.dc:creator: Margaret
item.description:
Alice:

Celeste isn’t that hard to read once you get past her shitposts.

Alright Ill make it harder

Read full topic

item.title: [FM] Viva la Revolution - Being Rerolled
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103
item.description:
But since I have no time to discuss and defend myself for that day and trust me that wasn’t intentionally to stay silent.

Read full topic

item.title: [FM] Viva la Revolution - Being Rerolled
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103
item.description:
It’s to discourage aggressive scumreaders whether I am town or scum.

Read full topic

item.title: [FM] Viva la Revolution - Being Rerolled
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103
item.description:
As I said before, that doesn’t prove I am scum.

That would be my intention to start the wagon too quick based on your words, you may end up springing into your own trap.

Read full topic

item.title: [FM] Viva la Revolution - Being Rerolled
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103
item.description:
I may be not seasoned forum mafia player, but I am not THE obvious.

Read full topic

item.title: [FM] Viva la Revolution - Being Rerolled
item.dc:creator: Alice
item.description:
Yeah, you’ve basically shifted from going to a player fully reliant on mechanics to a decent reader in very small time frame.

Read full topic

item.title: [FM] Viva la Revolution - Being Rerolled
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103
item.description:
Because at the second night when the tracker picked unfortunate player that happens to visit me (does not reveal publically) I would say I got informed that I got bomb planted and say that while what tracker suspected it could be him, but might be not the only one.

Alice:

A real Citizen wouldn’t be so obsessed with confirming themselves.

It wasn’t that obsessed.

Read full topic

Frostwolf103:

track me, you just going to waste your time

It was kind of obvious that this was more likely a bluff than a genuine cit asking to be tracked, which is why I switched onto you early game.

item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103

For scum I had Frost,

“Had”?

Besides its not enough reason to suspect me just because I said ‘track me, you just going to waste your time’

item.title: [FM] Viva la Revolution - Being Rerolled
item.dc:creator: Alice
item.description:
Solic:

You are mistaken if you think I had you as lock town in FE Sarun

I played way too rashly in FE even for my common scum play-style, so if anyone had me as a lock town there I’d be extremely surprised. Shurian, Squid, and a few other players were surprised that I killed Orange and flipped Mafia, so I was probably town-read by many people

Solic:

I thought my relation to you in FE might help me read you in the chess game

Basically, you town-read me in Chess as I was playing way too cautiously when compared to my scum game in FE?

Solic:

Did you at least consider that I was truly a neutral survivor backpedalling?

Not really. I imagined you were really town and that was just a reaction test, which I was correct.

Read full topic

item.title: [FM] Viva la Revolution - Being Rerolled
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
You are mistaken if you think I had you as lock town in FE Sarun, but with that you had material to accuse me and I might not win that. I hadn’t fakeclaimed as town before, so you were not someone that I preferred to push. I must admit I was not that suspicious of you. I thought my relation to you in FE might help me read you in the chess game, so my marriage proposal was not without any preconceived intentions.

Did you at least consider that I was truly a neutral survivor backpedalling?

Read full topic

item.description:
Also ngl I thought Fire was Tracker

Read full topic

item.title: [FM] Viva la Revolution - Being Rerolled

item.description:
I already said good read lmao

item.title: [FM] Viva la Revolution - Being Rerolled
item.dc:creator: Alice
item.description:
Reaction tests typically don’t work that well with experienced scum, though.

Case in point.

Are you town or mafia? I am a neutral survivor, hence me trying to make less of an appearance, but still aid town. I can heal myself or someone else if I have attempted an ITA during the day and I am occupy/redirect immune. I can block ITA’s with a day ability that gives my heal and this ability another use if I successfully block one.

Read full topic

item.title: [FM] Viva la Revolution - Being Rerolled
item.dc:creator: Icibalus
item.description:
lolreactiontests

Read full topic

item.title: [FM] Viva la Revolution - Being Rerolled
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
Also all my pushes are not always genuine and simply reaction testing. I just don’t reveal it after one or two posts as people typically do here.

Read full topic

item.title: [FM] Viva la Revolution - Being Rerolled
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
In general, I lock on a bit too much I feel, but that is because Wham played me in Cult in the Jungle and I cannot let something like that go I betray my early reads way too much, so I wanted to stop doing that.

I did think you were town on day 3 in the Chess match fyi. You were not my preferred lynch.

Read full topic

item.title: [FM] Viva la Revolution - Being Rerolled
item.dc:creator: Alice
item.description:
Alice:

TvT situations

Icibalus:

when you’re right

He locked on to me at Chess, albeit I have to admit that I fucked up the push on M, and he basically got tricked by scum and locked onto Livicus in FE, so he needs better targeting.

Read full topic

IMO, his death-tunneling somewhat needs work and at times he just locks-on TvT situations. But he’s fine aside from this.

item.title: [FM] Viva la Revolution - Being Rerolled
item.dc:creator: Alice
item.description:
I read you here as I really doubt that Scum!Solic would try to game-solve while powerwolfing. In Chess, I read you as town as there’s no way in hell a mafia member would try to defend another one so hard like what you did with Unknown. In SFoL28 I read you as you were the one providing the least input and no motivation at all so I assumed you likely were the oldest Eevee. FE is self-explenatory.

Read full topic
